description.dispensary_bio: A standout collaboration from MF x Seed Junky, Juicy Jane drips with tropical fruit sweetness layered over cool mint and earthy spice. Its candy-bright flavor up front softens into herbal depth, creating a profile that’s playful yet refined. It strikes a balance between lifted clarity and soothing calm, making it a versatile strain that shines in both social settings and solo sessions.
vibes_like: Brightening the afternoon with fruit-forward flavor and flow
Easing into conversation with a smooth, balanced high
Finding the sweet spot between energy and relaxation
description.product_positioning: Modern Flower x Seed Junky 3.5g Flower represents a premium collab built around standout flavor and genetics. Each eighth is filled with potent, terpene-rich flower that reflects Seed Junky’s legendary profiles while staying true to Modern Flower’s approachable style. It’s an expression designed for patients who want both everyday reliability and next-level character.
description.brand_info: When Modern Flower links up with Seed Junky, you know it’s fire. Modern Flower keeps it fresh, stylish, and accessible, while Seed Junky brings the legendary genetics and next-level flavors the culture craves. Together, they’re crafting strains that hit hard, taste incredible, and deliver the kind of quality you can always count on. This collab is all about keeping it real—blending Modern Flower’s everyday vibe with Seed Junky’s elite reputation—so every session feels authentic, elevated, and straight-up unforgettable.

session_template.suggested_dose_guidance_text: Balanced hybrid with 24.2% THC. Good for social situations or daytime relaxation. Start with 0.25-0.5g for moderate effects.

comparative_context.release_info: Limited-edition hybrid introduced in Florida late 2025 as part of the '12 Days of Cannabis' holiday collab drop between Modern Flower and Seed Junky Genetics
market_availability: Available as whole flower (3.5g jars), Minis (small buds), pre-rolls, and live resin vape carts
Often sells out quickly due to limited batches and premium positioning
distinguishing_characteristics: Elite pedigree combining Guava Gelato/Sherb genetics with Seed Junky's Cap Junky line
Exceptionally high terpene content (~2.5% total) with strong tropical-citrus-mint profile
Potent but balanced - 28-29% THC with well-rounded hybrid effects
Candy-bright flavor that's both playful and refined
Strong aroma noted by users as 'orange citrus cleaner with pine backnote'
medical_therapeutic_notes: Fast cerebral onset with euphoric headrush
Stress relief and anxiety reduction while maintaining mental sharpness
Mild pain relief with gentle body relaxation
Mood enhancement and focus improvement
Versatile for social settings or solo sessions

comparison_highlights.vs_white_sunshine: Juicy Jane emphasizes fruit-forward flavor and faster cerebral effects, while White Sunshine offers more daytime balance
comparison_highlights.vs_margalope: Juicy Jane is more balanced hybrid with stronger body relaxation, while Margalope leans sativa with creative energizing lift

description.dispensary_bio: Beaming with sweet pine, gas, and skunky flavors, this loud hybrid lightens and brightens the mood with a blissful energy that shines from the first hit to the last.
vibes_like: Finding your balance between sunrise and sunset
Blending easy calm with bright, balanced clarity
Transforming any time of day into the golden hour
description.product_positioning: Sunshine Cannabis Flower in the 3.5g size is beautifully cured whole buds in the perfect quantity for everyday enjoyment. Each vibrant strain is grown indoors with care, ensuring bright flavors and consistent quality you can count on. Enjoy freely and savor the sunshine in every session, knowing your flower was cultivated with dedication to freshness, flavor, and feel-good vibes.
description.brand_info: Sunshine Cannabis, founded in 2013, is a multiple award-winning cannabis company and the first brand partner of Trulieve. Together, they provide Florida patients with legendary heirloom strains known for their rich flavors and carefully selected terpene profiles. Committed to delivering consistent, reliable, and potent effects, every product is tested by trusted third-party labs to ensure purity and quality.

session_template.suggested_dose_guidance_text: This is a potent hybrid (27.5% THC). Start with 0.25g if inexperienced. Good for daytime energy with balanced calm.

comparative_context.alternative_genetics_note: White Sunshine has two known genetic lineages in circulation. The Florida version (Trulieve/Sunshine Cannabis) uses The White x Sunshine Daydream from Bodhi Seeds. Other markets may carry White Widow x Sour Diesel variants. Always verify lineage by checking breeder/dispensary info.
market_availability: Oregon (Kush Cart PDX with Bodhi lineage)
distinguishing_characteristics: Frosty appearance consistent with 'White' family genetics
Dynamic terpene profile varies by phenotype - Florida cut emphasizes sweet pine, gas, and skunk
Robust potency (27-30% THC range in premium batches)
Versatile effects - can tilt uplifting or relaxing depending on terpene expression
medical_therapeutic_notes: Clear-headed euphoria suitable for daytime use
Mood elevation and stress relief
Balanced energy without heavy sedation
Some phenotypes (WA Khush Kush) provide more body relaxation for pain relief

comparison_highlights.vs_juicy_jane: White Sunshine offers more balanced daytime energy, while Juicy Jane delivers fruit-forward flavor with stronger cerebral onset
comparison_highlights.vs_margalope: White Sunshine provides hybrid balance, while Margalope leans more sativa with pronounced creative/energizing effects

description.dispensary_bio: Margalope, a skunky sativa cross of Chocolope and Frozen Margy, delivers a unique aroma of gas, fruit, and floral notes with a sweet, rich flavor. The energizing effects lean uplifting and may help ease discomfort while keeping the mood bright.
vibes_like: Starting the day with a fruity, gassy spark
Leaning into creative focus without feeling weighed down
Keeping energy upbeat while easing tension
description.product_positioning: Planet 13 Tier 3 flower showcases sun-grown, terpene-rich buds cultivated with hands-on care and modern indoor technology. Each 3.5g pouch highlights the cultivar’s signature aroma and balanced potency for an easygoing sativa session.
description.brand_info: Planet 13 crafts cannabis with a blend of hands-on cultivation and innovative technology to preserve bold terpene profiles. Their indoor conservatories harness natural sunlight to deliver consistent, strain-specific effects.

session_template.suggested_dose_guidance_text: This is a moderate sativa (20.3% THC). Good for daytime creativity and energy. Start with 0.25-0.5g for uplifting effects.

comparative_context.genetics_origin: Created by Cannarado Genetics crossing DNA Genetics' Chocolope (Chocolate Thai x Cannalope Haze) with Cannarado's Frozen Margy. Released as seed, allowing multiple cultivators to grow it.
market_availability: Florida (Planet 13 - Tier 3 flower, pre-rolls, vape cartridges)
Illinois (The Botanist/GTI, Revolution Cannabis, Curaleaf - flower and live resin)
Nevada/California (likely via Planet 13's Las Vegas operations)
Ohio and Maryland (reported via GTI/Curaleaf operations)
distinguishing_characteristics: Terpene-rich profile - some producers report 3-4% total terpenes (Illinois batches)
Unique 'skunky tropical fruit' aroma with chocolate undertones
Terpinolene-dominant (0.46%) giving fruity, citrusy character
Moderate THC (16-25% range, FL Tier 3 at ~16.9%) but robust terpene expression
Planet 13's Tier 3 designation indicates sun-grown indoor cultivation with natural sunlight assist
Extra-large, sugar-coated buds characteristic of the strain
medical_therapeutic_notes: Energizing, clear-headed lift suitable for daytime use
Creative focus and mood elevation without anxiety
Light body relaxation that eases muscle tension without sedation
Effective for chronic stress, depression, pain, and PTSD
Balanced sativa-indica effects - 'creative euphoria without the crash'
Note: Terpinolene can cause mild stimulation/racing in sensitive users at higher doses

comparison_highlights.vs_white_sunshine: Margalope is more sativa-leaning with pronounced creative/energizing effects, while White Sunshine offers hybrid balance
comparison_highlights.vs_juicy_jane: Margalope emphasizes uplifting sativa effects with lower THC but higher terpene character, while Juicy Jane is more potent balanced hybrid

comparative_context.flavor_profile_detail: Sweet and creamy inhale with faint chocolate/cocoa notes, diesel fuel and peppery spice on exhale, with tangy fruit and floral touches throughout

description.dispensary_bio: Southern Pound Cake delivers a rich aroma of sweet vanilla cake layered with gassy richness. This indica-dominant phenotype (#7) of Wedding Cake × Kush Mints offers a calming headband-like weight and full-body ease, making it ideal for unwinding. With chunky, golden-colored buds dripping with resin and glistening trichomes, it resembles a sweet slice of freshly-frosted pound cake. The flavor profile features minty, cakey dough notes that coat your mouth with sweet vanilla frosting and baked goods on the inhale, followed by light peppery earth and cool mint on the finish.
vibes_like: After-dinner dessert strain to melt away the day's stress
Couch-locked evening watching movies or listening to mellow music
Nightcap an hour or two before bed for deep, restful sleep
Easing chronic pain while enjoying sweet, dessert-like flavors
description.product_positioning: Roll One's Southern Pound Cake is a high-value, low-cost flower option delivering top-shelf potency at mid-shelf prices. This budget-friendly indica 'punches above its weight' with powerful sedative effects, exceptional terpene-rich vanilla cake aroma, and deeply relaxing body high. Best bang-for-buck indica flower available in the Florida market.
description.brand_info: Roll One by Trulieve is a value-oriented product line that delivers premium genetics and potent effects at accessible prices. Southern Pound Cake exemplifies this approach—cultivated in Florida with careful phenotype selection (pheno #7) to emphasize dessert-like flavors and strong indica effects while keeping costs low for medical patients.

coa.cultivar_on_coa: Southern Pound Cake (Wedding Cake × Kush Mints pheno #7)

session_template.suggested_dose_guidance_text: This is a potent indica (22-30% THC depending on batch). Start with a small dose—one or two puffs for beginners. Effects set in with a creeping calm that gradually builds into powerful, sedative relaxation. Experienced users can enjoy a standard bowl but should be prepared for significant couch-lock and drowsiness. Best for evening or nighttime use when you have no responsibilities. Not for productivity—this is strictly 'off the clock' relaxation.

disclaimers: This information is provided for general informational purposes only and is not intended as medical advice.
Terpene and cannabinoid profiles are commonly associated with certain characteristics but individual experiences may differ.
Effects and experiences may vary by individual. Start with a low dose and wait to understand your personal response.
This is a very potent strain (22-30% THC depending on batch). Beginners should use extreme caution and start with minimal doses.

comparative_context.genetics_origin: Southern Pound Cake is phenotype #7 of a Wedding Cake × Kush Mints cross, cultivated exclusively by Trulieve in Florida. Wedding Cake (Triangle Kush × Animal Mints) brings sweet vanilla cake taste and heavy body effects, while Kush Mints (Bubba Kush × Animal Mints) adds minty cookie flavor and potent relaxation. This specific pheno was selected to emphasize dessert-like flavors and strong indica effects. Note: This is essentially the same genetic pairing often known as 'LA Kush Cake' or 'Kush Cake' elsewhere.
market_availability: Florida - Exclusively available at Trulieve dispensaries statewide (medical only) as part of Roll One brand
Batch availability can be intermittent due to high demand - often sells out during sales
Trulieve regularly announces restocks on social media
Seeds available from some breeders (Captain Seeds, etc.) for home cultivation in legal states
Same genetics may appear as 'LA Kush Cake' or 'Wedding Mints' at other dispensaries in other states
distinguishing_characteristics: Trulieve-exclusive phenotype #7 of Wedding Cake × Kush Mints
High THC range: 22-30% depending on batch (some batches test exceptionally high)
Caryophyllene-dominant terpene profile (~0.51%) with significant linalool (~0.38%) and limonene (~0.2%)
Total terpenes around 1.3-1.4% - lower than some ultra-premium strains but well-expressed
Distinctive 'vanilla cake layered with gassy richness' aroma
Chunky, golden-colored buds dripping with resin and glistening trichomes
Machine-trimmed with variable bud size (small to medium, sometimes 'popcorn' nugs)
Well-cured with good moisture retention - sticky when broken up, not overly dry
Exceptional value pricing: $20-35 per eighth (commonly $25 on sale)
Effects 'punch above weight' for the price - compared favorably to more expensive top-shelf indicas
medical_therapeutic_notes: Stress and Anxiety Relief - Linalool and limonene provide calming, uplifting effects; steady mood elevation
Pain Management - β-caryophyllene's anti-inflammatory properties plus strong body buzz help chronic pain, inflammation, muscle spasms, and headaches
Insomnia and Sleep Support - Sedative finish commonly induces drowsiness; excellent evening/nighttime strain
Appetite Stimulation - May trigger munchies, beneficial for appetite loss from illness or treatments
Mood Disorders - Uplifting yet calming nature helps depression and PTSD by providing mood lift with reduced intrusive thoughts
Characteristic 'headband-like weight' behind eyes and across forehead helps tension headaches
Effects described as 'creeping calm' that gradually crescendos into powerful, sedative relaxation
Warning: High THC and heavy indica effects can be intense - potential couch-lock and drowsiness
Not suitable when focus, motor coordination, or energy needed - avoid driving or operating machinery
Common side effects: dry mouth, dry eyes, dizziness (especially at higher doses)

comparison_highlights.vs_wedding_cake: Southern Pound Cake inherits Wedding Cake's dessert flavor and euphoria but adds significantly stronger sedative effects from Kush Mints. More couch-locking.
comparison_highlights.vs_london_pound_cake: Comparable potency and sedative effects. Some users report Southern Pound Cake rivaling London Pound Cake batches. Southern Pound Cake has more vanilla/cake notes vs London's more berry-forward profile.
comparison_highlights.vs_kush_mints: Maintains Kush Mints' powerful relaxation while adding Wedding Cake's sweeter vanilla flavor profile and more pronounced mood elevation.
comparison_highlights.vs_la_kush_cake: Same genetics (Wedding Cake × Kush Mints) but Southern Pound Cake is Trulieve's specific pheno #7. LA Kush Cake may vary by producer.
comparison_highlights.vs_sanctuary_wedding_mints: Very similar genetics (Wedding Cake × Kush Mints #11 vs pheno #7). Sanctuary's version priced similarly ($30-40/eighth) but different phenotype selection.

comparative_context.flavor_profile_detail: Opens with sweet vanilla cake layered with gassy richness. The 'minty, cakey dough' scent fills the room and transfers well to taste. Inhale brings sweet vanilla frosting and baked goods with subtle floral notes (linalool). Exhale reveals light peppery earth (caryophyllene), cool mint (limonene), and doughy cake batter. The flavor coats your mouth and lingers pleasantly. Smooth, rich smoke. Overall a pronounced terpene profile that exceeds expectations for a budget-tier strain.

consumer_feedback_summary.quality: Bag appeal is average - machine-trimmed with variable bud sizes (small to medium, some 'popcorn' nugs). However, buds are still frosty with abundant trichomes and great cure (not overly dry, slightly sticky). Quality satisfactory for price point.
consumer_feedback_summary.aroma_flavor: Consistently praised. 'Minty, cakey dough' aroma that 'transfers to taste very well.' Users surprised a value-tier strain has such pronounced terpene profile. 'Pretty awesome' flavor with sweet cake and vanilla balanced by gassy, minty backend.
consumer_feedback_summary.effects_potency: Where it truly excels. 'Gets me very medicated' at $20-25/eighth. Heavy-hitting and relaxing. 'Couldn't believe I didn't have to reach for something stronger.' Compared favorably to more expensive strains. 'Very stoney,' 'heavy indica leaning,' potent sedative buzz that outperforms some higher-priced indicas.
consumer_feedback_summary.value: Exceptional. 'Getting top-shelf effects for bottom-shelf cost.' 'For $20 it's a great ass deal.' Has 'sleeper hit' status - not flashy but delivers where it counts. 'One of the best budget indica flowers in Florida market.' Minor downsides: inconsistent bud size, slightly less flavorful than ultra-premium boutique batches, but critiques are mild given price.
consumer_feedback_summary.overall_sentiment: Highly recommended by Florida patients. Strong reputation for value. 'Punches above its weight.' Perfect for evening relief. Go-to for medical users seeking pain, stress, and sleep support at affordable price. Be prepared for potent, couch-locking experience and have snacks ready.

pricing_detail.pricing_notes: Trulieve frequently runs promotions. Patients commonly purchase at $25/eighth during sales. Occasional special deals bring it to $20/eighth (e.g., $40 quarter-ounce deals). At $20-25, it's one of the best bang-for-buck indica flowers in Florida.

freshness_guidance.best_storage: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dark place. Ideal temperature is 60-70°F (15-21°C) with 59-63% relative humidity. Due to its rich terpene content, proper storage is essential to maintain the dessert-like aroma and flavor.
freshness_guidance.notes: Flower quality begins to degrade after opening. Terpenes are volatile and evaporate over time, especially the delicate dessert notes. Use within 3-6 months of purchase for optimal experience. The high resin content helps preserve potency but proper humidity control is crucial.
